body_html:
@soumith I also meet the same problem. So I try to install tra.bz2 offline.
conda install magma-cuda80-2.1.0-5.tar.bz2
And the error occurs like,
`CondaError: EOFError('compressed file ended before the logical end-of-stream was detected',)

CondaError: EOFError('compressed file ended before the logical end-of-stream was detected',)

CondaError: EOFError('compressed file ended before the logical end-of-stream was detected',)`

Is there any solutions?

body:
@soumith  I also meet the same problem. So I try to install tra.bz2 offline.
`conda install magma-cuda80-2.1.0-5.tar.bz2`
 And the error occurs like,
`CondaError: EOFError('compressed file ended before the logical end-of-stream was detected',)

CondaError: EOFError('compressed file ended before the logical end-of-stream was detected',)

CondaError: EOFError('compressed file ended before the logical end-of-stream was detected',)`

Is there any solutions?
